General.Name: Saudi Fisheries Co.
General.Description: Saudi Fisheries Company engages in fishing, fish-farming, and other activities in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company engages in processing and preservation of shrimps and aquatic organisms; and in online sale of sea food and related products. It also operates shrimps and seafood grilling shops; and operates seafood restaurants. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: 8705 Nasr Bin Ghanem - Al Malaz, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 12641
